title: Let's Watch TV: The Family Stone
description:
This week, Joe and Fran watch a Dombrowski family classic, The Family Stone. Joe tries his best not to spoil the movie and Mama Fran reveals what makes her cry every time she watches!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
